GUI

Class PrincipalViewDataFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.PrincipalViewDataFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlledScreen, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class PrincipalViewDataFrame
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, ControlledScreen
    Manages The screen where the principal views all the data placed in the database.
